00033 #define IMAGE_HPP_

00035 #include <algorithm>
00036 #include <math.h>

00038 using namespace std;
00039 
00040 #define BLK_AVRG(nlin, ncol) {\
00041   int k,l; int norm = ncol * nlin;\
00042   int acc0=0, acc1=0, acc2=0;\
00043   for (k=0; k<nlin; k++) {\
00044   register T *pinptr = pin+k*in_mod0;\
00045   for (l=0; l<ncol; l++) {\
00046   acc0 += pinptr[0];acc1 += pinptr[1];acc2 += pinptr[2];\
00047   pinptr += in_mod1; }}\
00048   pout[0] = acc0 / norm;pout[1] = acc1 / norm;pout[2] = acc2 / norm;}
00049 
00050 namespace ebl {

00052 
00053 template<class T> Idx<T> image_crop(Idx<T> &in, int x, int y, int w, int h){
00054         Idx<T> bla = in.narrow(0, h, y).narrow(1, w, x);
00055         Idx<T> bla3(bla.dim(0), bla.dim(1), bla.order() < 3 ? -1 : bla.dim(2));
00056         idx_copy(bla, bla3);
00057         return bla3;
00058 }
00059 
00060 
00061 template<class T> Idx<T> image_resize(Idx<T> &image, double w, double h, int mode) {
00062         Idx<T> im(image);
00063         if (im.order() < 2) ylerror("image must have at least an order of 2.");
00064         intg imw = im.dim(1);
00065         intg imh = im.dim(0);
00066         int rw = 0;
00067         int rh = 0;
00068         // determine actual size of output image
00069         if ((0 == w) || (0 == h)) {
00070                 if (0 == w) {
00071                   if (0 == h) {
00072                         ylerror("desired width and height cannot be both zero");
00073                   } else {
00074                         w = max(1, (int) (imw * (h / imh)));
00075                   }
00076                 } else h = max(1, (int) (imh * (w / imw)));
00077         }
00078         else if (mode == 0) {
00079                 double r = min(w / imw, h / imh);
00080                 w = max(1, (int) (r * imw));
00081     h = max(1, (int) (r * imh));
00082         }
00083         else if (mode == 1) {
00084                 w = max(1, (int) w);
00085                 h = max(1, (int) h);
00086         }
00087         else if (mode == 2) {
00088                 w = max(1, (int) (w * imw));
00089                 h = max(1, (int) (h * imh));
00090         }
00091         else ylerror("image_resize: illegal mode or desired dimensions");
00092         // compute closest integer subsampling ratio
00093         rw = (int) imw / w;
00094         rh = (int) imh / h;
00095         // subsample by integer ratio if necessary
00096         if ((0 != rh) || (0 != rw)) {
00097                 im = image_subsample(im, rh, rw);
00098                 imw = im.dim(1);
00099                 imh = im.dim(0);
00100         }
00101         // resample from subsampled image with bilinear interpolation
00102         Idx<T> rez(h, w, (im.order() == 3) ? im.dim(2) : 1);
00103         Idx<T> bg(4);
00104         idx_clear(bg);
00105         // the 0.5 thingies are necessary because warp-bilin interprets
00106         // integer coordinates as beiing at the center of each pixel.
00107         float x1 = -0.5, y1 = -0.5, x3 = imw - 0.5, y3 = imh - 0.5;
00108         float p1 = -0.5, q1 = -0.5, p3 = w - 0.5, q3 = h - 0.5;
00109         image_warp_quad(im, rez, bg, 1, x1, y1, x3, y1, x3, y3, x1, y3, p1, q1, p3, q3);
00110         if (im.order() == 2)
00111                 return rez.select(2, 0);
00112         return rez;
00113 }
00114 
00115 template<class T> Idx<T> image_subsample_grayscale(Idx<T> &in, int nlin, int ncol) {
00116         intg h = in.dim(0);
00117         intg w = in.dim(1);
00118         intg nh = h / nlin;
00119         intg nw = w / ncol;
00120         Idx<T> out(nh, nw);
00121         if ((nlin == 1) && (ncol == 1)) {
00122                 idx_copy(in, out);
00123                 return out;
00124         }
00125         Idx<T> inp = in.narrow(0, nlin * nh, 0);
00126         inp = inp.narrow(1, ncol * nw, 0);
00127         T *_idx2loopc1, *pin;
00128         T *_idx2loopc2, *pout;
00129         int i, _imax = out.dim(0);
00130         int j, _jmax = out.dim(1);
00131         int _imat1_m0 = inp.mod(0);
00132         int _imat1_m1 = inp.mod(1);
00133         int _imat2_m0 = out.mod(0);
00134         int _imat2_m1 = out.mod(1);
00135         int pin_incr = ncol * _imat1_m1;
00136         int norm = ncol * nlin;
00137         register int acc0;
00138         register int k,l;
00139         register T *pinptr;
00140         register int pinptr_incr = _imat1_m0 - ncol* _imat1_m1;
00141         _idx2loopc1 = inp.idx_ptr();
00142         _idx2loopc2 = out.idx_ptr();
00143         for (i = 0; i < _imax; i++) {
00144                 pin = _idx2loopc1;
00145                 pout = _idx2loopc2;
00146                 for (j = 0; j < _jmax; j++) {
00147                         acc0 =0;
00148                         pinptr = pin;
00149                         for (k=0; k<nlin; k++) {
00150                                 for (l=0; l<ncol; l++) {
00151                                         acc0 += pinptr[0];
00152                                         pinptr += _imat1_m1;
00153                                 }
00154                                 pinptr += pinptr_incr;
00155                         }
00156                         pout[0] = acc0/norm;
00157                         pin += pin_incr;
00158                         pout += _imat2_m1;
00159                 }
00160                 _idx2loopc1 += _imat1_m0 * nlin;
00161                 _idx2loopc2 += _imat2_m0;
00162         }
00163         return out;
00164 }
00165 
00166 template<class T> Idx<T> image_subsample_rgb(Idx<T> &in, int nlin, int ncol) {
00167         intg h = in.dim(0);
00168         intg w = in.dim(1);
00169         intg nh = h / nlin;
00170         intg nw = w / ncol;
00171         Idx<T> out(nh, nw, in.dim(2));
00172         if ((nlin == 1) && (ncol == 1)) {
00173                 idx_copy(in, out);
00174                 return out;
00175         }
00176         Idx<T> inp = in.narrow(0, nlin * nh, 0).narrow(1, ncol * nw, 0);
00177         T *in_line, *pin;
00178         T *out_line, *pout;
00179         int i, _imax = out.dim(0);
00180         int j, _jmax = out.dim(1);
00181         int in_mod0 = inp.mod(0);
00182         int in_mod1 = inp.mod(1);
00183         int out_mod0 = out.mod(0);
00184         int out_mod1 = out.mod(1);
00185         int pin_incr = ncol * in_mod1;
00186         in_line = inp.idx_ptr();
00187         out_line = out.idx_ptr();
00188         for (i = 0; i < _imax; i++) {
00189                 pin = in_line;
00190                 pout = out_line;
00191                 for (j = 0; j < _jmax; j++) {
00192                         BLK_AVRG(nlin, ncol);
00193                         pin += pin_incr;
00194                         pout += out_mod1;
00195                 }
00196                 in_line += in_mod0 * nlin;
00197                 out_line += out_mod0;
00198         }
00199         return out;
00200 }
00201 
00202 template<class T> Idx<T> image_subsample(Idx<T> &in, int nlin, int ncol) {
00203         switch (in.order()) {
00204         case 2:
00205                 return image_subsample_grayscale(in, nlin, ncol);
00206   case 3:
00207                 return image_subsample_rgb(in, nlin, ncol);
00208   default:
00209         ylerror("image must have at least an order of 2.");
00210         return in;
00211         }
00212 }
00213 
00214 template<class T> void image_warp_quad(Idx<T> &in, Idx<T> &out,
00215                 Idx<T> &background, int mode,
00216                 float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2, float x3, float y3,
00217                 float x4, float y4, float p1, float q1, float p3, float q3) {
00218   intg outi = out.dim(0);
00219   intg outj = out.dim(1);
00220   Idx<int> dispi(outi, outj);
00221   Idx<int> dispj(outi, outj);
00222   compute_bilin_transform<float>(dispi, dispj, x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3,
00223                 x4, y4, p1, q1, p3, q3);
00224   if (0 == mode)
00225           image_warp_fast(in, out, background.idx_ptr(), dispi, dispj);
00226   else
00227           image_warp(in, out, background, dispi, dispj);
00228 }
00229 
00230 
00231 template<class T> void image_warp(Idx<T> &in, Idx<T> &out, Idx<T> &background,
00232                 Idx<int> &pi, Idx<int> &pj) {
00233   T* pin = in.idx_ptr();
00234   int indimi = in.dim(0);
00235   int indimj = in.dim(1);
00236   int inmodi = in.mod(0);
00237   int inmodj = in.mod(1);
00238   int ppi, ppj;
00239   { idx_bloop3(lout, out, T, lpi, pi, int, lpj, pj, int) {
00240         { idx_bloop3(llout, lout, T, llpi, lpi, int, llpj, lpj, int) {
00241                 ppi = llpi.get();
00242                 ppj = llpj.get();
00243       image_interpolate_bilin(background.idx_ptr(), pin, indimi, indimj,
00244                 inmodi, inmodj, ppi, ppj, llout->idx_ptr(), (int) out.dim(2));
00245         }}
00246   }}
00247 }
00248 
00249 template<class T> void image_warp_fast(Idx<T> &in, Idx<T> &out, T *background,
00250                 Idx<int> &pi, Idx<int> &pj) {
00251           T* pin = in.idx_ptr();
00252           int indimi = in.dim(0);
00253           int indimj = in.dim(1);
00254           int inmodi = in.mod(0);
00255           int inmodj = in.mod(1);
00256           int ppi, ppj;
00257           register int li, lj;
00258           register T *inn, *outt;
00259           int outsize = out.dim(2);
00260           { idx_bloop3(lout, out, T, lpi, pi, int, lpj, pj, int) {
00261                 { idx_bloop3(llout, lout, T, llpi, lpi, int, llpj, lpj, int) {
00262                         outt = llout->idx_ptr();
00263                         ppi = llpi.get();
00264                         ppj = llpj.get();
00265                   li = (ppi+0x7f) >> 16;
00266                   lj = (ppj+0x7f) >> 16;
00267                   if ((li>=0) && (li<indimi) && (lj>=0) && (lj<indimj)) {
00268                         inn = (T*)(pin) + inmodi * li + inmodj * lj;
00269                         outt[0] = inn[0];
00270                         if (outsize >= 3) {
00271                                 outt[1] = inn[1];
00272                                 outt[2] = inn[2];
00273                         }
00274                         if (outsize >= 4)
00275                                 outt[3] = inn[3];
00276                   } else {
00277                         outt[0] = *(background);
00278                         if (outsize >= 3) {
00279                                 outt[1] = *(background+1);
00280                                 outt[2] = *(background+2);
00281                         }
00282                         if (outsize >= 4)
00283                                 outt[3] = *(background+3);
00284                   }
00285                 }}
00286           }}
00287 }
00288 
00289 template<class T> void image_interpolate_bilin(T* background, T *pin,
00290                 int indimi, int indimj, int inmodi, int inmodj, int ppi, int ppj,
00291                 T* out, int outsize) {
00292         int li0, lj0;
00293         register int li1, lj1;
00294         int deltai, ndeltai;
00295         int deltaj, ndeltaj;
00296         register T *pin00;
00297         register T *v00, *v01, *v10, *v11;
00298         li0 = ppi >> 16;
00299         li1 = li0+1;
00300         deltai = ppi & 0x0000ffff;
00301         ndeltai = 0x00010000 - deltai;
00302         lj0 = ppj  >> 16;
00303         lj1 = lj0+1;
00304         deltaj = ppj & 0x0000ffff;
00305         ndeltaj = 0x00010000 - deltaj;
00306         pin00 = (T*)(pin) + inmodi * li0 + inmodj * lj0;
00307         if ((li1>0)&&(li1<indimi)) {
00308                 if ((lj1>0)&&(lj1<indimj)) {
00309                         v00 = (pin00);
00310                         v01 = (pin00+inmodj);
00311                         v11 = (pin00+inmodi+inmodj);
00312                         v10 = (pin00+inmodi);
00313                 } else if (lj1==0) {
00314                         v00 = background;
00315                         v01 = (pin00+inmodj);
00316                         v11 = (pin00+inmodi+inmodj);
00317                         v10 = background;
00318                 } else if (lj1==indimj) {
00319                         v00 = (pin00);
00320                         v01 = background;
00321                         v11 = background;
00322                         v10 = (pin00+inmodi);
00323                 } else {
00324                         v00 = background;
00325                         v01 = background;
00326                         v11 = background;
00327                         v10 = background;
00328                 }
00329         } else if (li1==0) {
00330                 if ((lj1>0)&&(lj1<indimj)) {
00331                         v00 = background;
00332                         v01 = background;
00333                         v11 = (pin00+inmodi+inmodj);
00334                         v10 = (pin00+inmodi);
00335                 } else if (lj1==0) {
00336                         v00 = background;
00337                         v01 = background;
00338                         v11 = (pin00+inmodi+inmodj);
00339                         v10 = background;
00340                 } else if (lj1==indimj) {
00341                         v00 = background;
00342                         v01 = background;
00343                         v11 = background;
00344                         v10 = (pin00+inmodi);
00345                 } else {
00346                         v00 = background;
00347                         v01 = background;
00348                         v11 = background;
00349                         v10 = background;
00350                 }
00351         } else if (li1==indimi) {
00352                 if ((lj1>0)&&(lj1<indimj)) {
00353                         v00 = (pin00);
00354                         v01 = (pin00+inmodj);
00355                         v11 = background;
00356                         v10 = background;
00357                 } else if (lj1==0) {
00358                         v00 = background;
00359                         v01 = (pin00+inmodj);
00360                         v11 = background;
00361                         v10 = background;
00362                 } else if (lj1==indimj) {
00363                         v00 = (pin00);
00364                         v01 = background;
00365                         v11 = background;
00366                         v10 = background;
00367                 } else {
00368                         v00 = background;
00369                         v01 = background;
00370                         v11 = background;
00371                         v10 = background;
00372                 }
00373         } else {
00374                 v00 = background;
00375                 v01 = background;
00376                 v11 = background;
00377                 v10 = background;
00378         }
00379         // TODO: this does not work for ubyte (cf ubyte implementation in image.cpp),
00380         // make it generic to avoid code redondancy.
00381         double dd = 1.0 / 65536.0;
00382         T d = (T) dd;
00383         if (sizeof (T) <= 2)
00384                 d = 0;
00385         if (outsize == 1)
00386           *out = (ndeltaj * (( *v10*deltai + *v00*ndeltai )*d) +
00387                            deltaj  * (( *v11*deltai + *v01*ndeltai )*d))*d;
00388         else {
00389                 if (outsize >= 3) {
00390                    *out = (ndeltaj * (( v10[0]*deltai + v00[0]*ndeltai )*d) +
00391                        deltaj  * (( v11[0]*deltai + v01[0]*ndeltai )*d))*d;
00392                    *(out + 1) = (ndeltaj * (( v10[1]*deltai + v00[1]*ndeltai )*d) +
00393                        deltaj  * (( v11[1]*deltai + v01[1]*ndeltai )*d))*d;
00394                    *(out + 2) = (ndeltaj * (( v10[2]*deltai + v00[2]*ndeltai )*d) +
00395                        deltaj  * (( v11[2]*deltai + v01[2]*ndeltai )*d))*d;
00396                 }
00397                 if (outsize >= 4) {
00398                    *(out + 3) = (ndeltaj * (( v10[3]*deltai + v00[3]*ndeltai )*d) +
00399                        deltaj  * (( v11[3]*deltai + v01[3]*ndeltai )*d))*d;
00400                 }
00401         }
00402 }
00403 
00404 template<class T> void compute_bilin_transform(Idx<int> &dispi, Idx<int> &dispj,
00405                 float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2, float x3, float y3,
00406                 float x4, float y4, float p1, float q1, float p3, float q3) {
00407         // compute transformation matrix from coordinates
00408         // in target (rectangular) space to coordinates
00409         // in original (irregular quadrilateral) image
00410         // transformation matrix is in 16.16 fixed point format.
00411         float k = 65536 / ((p3 - p1) * (q3 - q1));
00412         float x41 = x4 - x1;
00413         float x21 = x2 - x1;
00414         float x43 = x4 - x3;
00415         float x23 = x2 - x3;
00416         int mx0 = k * ((q3 * x21) + (q1 * x43));
00417         int mx1 = k * ((p3 * x41) + (p1 * x23));
00418         int mx2 = (-k) * (x41 + x23);
00419         int mx3 = k * (((p3 * q3 * x1) + (p1 * q1 * x3)) -
00420                         ((p1 * q3 * x2) + (p3 * q1 * x4)));
00421         float y41 = y4 - y1;
00422         float y21 = y2 - y1;
00423         float y43 = y4 - y3;
00424         float y23 = y2 - y3;
00425         int my0 = k * ((q3 * y21) + (q1 * y43));
00426         int my1 = k * ((p3 * y41) + (p1 * y23));
00427         int my2 = (-k) * (y41 + y23);
00428         int my3 = k * (((p3 * q3 * y1) + (p1 * q1 * y3)) -
00429                         ((p1 * q3 * y2) + (p3 * q1 * y4)));
00430         int q = 0, p = 0;
00431         { idx_bloop2(ispi, dispi, int, ispj, dispj, int) {
00432                 p = 0;
00433                 { idx_bloop2(di, ispi, int, dj, ispj, int) {
00434                         di->set(my0 * p + my1 * q + my2 * p * q + my3);
00435                         dj->set(mx0 * p + mx1 * q + mx2 * p * q + mx3);
00436                         p++;
00437                 }}
00438                 q++;
00439         }}
00440 }
00441 
00442 template<class T> void image_rotscale(Idx<T> &src, Idx<T> &out,
00443                 double sx, double sy, double dx, double dy,
00444                 double angle, double coeff, Idx<ubyte> &bg){
00445         double q = 1000;
00446         double coeff_inv = 1/coeff;
00447         double sa = q*sin(angle * 0.017453292);
00448         double ca = q*cos(angle * 0.017453292);
00449         double ca_plus_sa = coeff_inv * (sa + ca);
00450         double ca_minus_sa = coeff_inv * (ca - sa);
00451         float x1 = sx - ca_plus_sa;
00452         float y1 = sy - ca_minus_sa;
00453         float x2 = sx + ca_minus_sa;
00454         float y2 = sy - ca_plus_sa;
00455         float x3 = sx + ca_plus_sa;
00456         float y3 = sy + ca_minus_sa;
00457         float x4 = sx - ca_minus_sa;
00458         float y4 = sy + ca_plus_sa;
00459         float p1 = dx-q;
00460         float q1 = dy-q;
00461         float p3 = dx + q;
00462         float q3 = dy + q;
00463         image_warp_quad(src, out, bg, 1, x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3, x4, y4, p1, q1, p3, q3);
00464 }
00465 
00466 
00467 
00468 template<class T> void image_draw_box(Idx<T> &img, T val,
00469                 unsigned int x, unsigned int y, unsigned int dx, unsigned int dy) {
00470         idx_checkorder1(img, 2);
00471   for (unsigned int i = x; i < x + dx; ++i) {
00472         img.set(val, i, y);
00473         img.set(val, i, y + dy);
00474   }
00475   for (unsigned int j = y; j < y + dy; ++j) {
00476         img.set(val, x, j);
00477         img.set(val, x + dx, j);
00478   }
00479 }
00480 
00481 template<class T> bool pnm_fread_into_rgbx(const char *fname, Idx<T> &out) {
00482         Idx<ubyte> tmp(1,1,1);
00483         bool ret = pnm_fread_into_rgbx(fname, tmp);
00484         out.resize(tmp.dim(0), tmp.dim(1), tmp.dim(2));
00485         idx_copy(tmp, out);
00486         return ret;
00487 }
00488 
00489 template<class T> bool image_read_rgbx(const char *fname, Idx<T> &out) {
00490         Idx<ubyte> tmp(1,1,1);
00491         bool ret = image_read_rgbx(fname, tmp);
00492         out.resize(tmp.dim(0), tmp.dim(1), tmp.dim(2));
00493         idx_copy(tmp, out);
00494         return ret;
00495 }

00498 // Utilities
00499 
00500 template<class T> void RGBtoYUV1D(Idx<T> &rgb, Idx<T> &yuv) {
00501         if (rgb.idx_ptr() == yuv.idx_ptr()) {
00502                 ylerror("RGBtoYUV: dst must be different than src");
00503                 return ;
00504         }
00505         yuv.set(0.257 * rgb.get(0) + 0.504 * rgb.get(1) + 0.098 * rgb.get(2) + 16, 0);
00506         yuv.set(0.439 * rgb.get(0) - (0.368 * rgb.get(1)) - (0.071 * rgb.get(2)) + 128, 1);
00507         yuv.set(-(0.148 * rgb.get(0)) - (0.291 * rgb.get(1)) + 0.439 * rgb.get(2) + 128, 2);
00508 }
00509 
00510 template<class T> void RGBtoYUV(Idx<T> &rgb, Idx<T> &yuv) {
00511         idx_checknelems2_all(rgb, yuv);
00512         switch (rgb.order()) {
00513         case 1: // process 1 pixel
00514                 RGBtoYUV1D(rgb, yuv);
00515                 return ;
00516         case 3: // process 2D image
00517                 { idx_bloop2(rg, rgb, T, yu, yuv, T) {
00518                         { idx_bloop2(r, rg, T, y, yu, T) {
00519                                 RGBtoYUV1D(r, y);
00520                         }}
00521                 }}
00522                 return ;
00523         default:
00524                 ylerror("RGBtoYUV dimension not implemented");
00525         }
00526 }
00527 
00528 template<class T> void YUVtoRGB1D(Idx<T> &yuv, Idx<T> &rgb) {
00529         if (rgb.idx_ptr() == yuv.idx_ptr()) {
00530                 ylerror("YUVtoRGB: dst must be different than src");
00531                 return ;
00532         }
00533         rgb.set(1.164 * (yuv.get(0) - 16) + 2.018 * (yuv.get(1) - 128), 0);
00534         rgb.set(1.164 * (yuv.get(0) - 16) - 0.813 * (yuv.get(2) - 128)
00535                         - 0.391 * (yuv.get(1) - 128), 1);
00536         rgb.set(1.164 * (yuv.get(0) - 16) + 1.596 * (yuv.get(2) - 128), 2);
00537 }
00538 
00539 template<class T> void YUVtoRGB(Idx<T> &yuv, Idx<T> &rgb) {
00540         idx_checknelems2_all(rgb, yuv);
00541         switch (yuv.order()) {
00542         case 1: // process 1 pixel
00543                 YUVtoRGB1D(yuv, rgb);
00544                 return ;
00545         case 3: // process 2D image
00546                 { idx_bloop2(rg, rgb, T, yu, yuv, T) {
00547                         { idx_bloop2(r, rg, T, y, yu, T) {
00548                                 YUVtoRGB1D(y, r);
00549                         }}
00550                 }}
00551                 return ;
00552         default:
00553                 ylerror("YUVtoRGB dimension not implemented");
00554         }
00555 }
00556 
00557 } // end namespace ebl

00559 #endif /* IMAGE_HPP_ */
